Title: Oppose the right deviationist reversing of verdicts, increase industrial production
Designer: Li Xingtao (李醒滔)Liang Zhaotang (梁照堂)
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: Opposing the right deviationist reversing of verdicts is part of the anti-Deng Xiaoping campaign of early 1976.
